job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtcandidates that do not meet or exceed the minimum stated requirements skillsexperience will be displayed to customers but may not be chosen for this opportunityltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtminimum requirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt years hands on development of machine learningltligtltligt years provide administration support for ml environment mlops which includes installation configuration upgrades and business continuity support in aws cloudltligtltligt years experience creating scripts to automate ml administration tasks schedules and deployment activitiesltligtltligt years demonstrated experience with linux administration and troubleshooting activitiesltligtltligt years excellent oral and written communication skillsltligtltligt years effectively manage multiple responsibilities prioritize conflicting assignments and switch quickly between assignments as requiredltligtltligt years experience working in an agile sprint teamltligtltligt years prior experience with an hhs agencyltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggteducational requirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt years bachelors degree in computer science information systems or business or equivalent experienceltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtpreferredltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtaws certified machine learning specialty certificationltligtltulgt
